attributes.action: Allow people to vote AGAINST an e-petition
attributes.additional_details:
E-Petitions are currently un-representative, as they only give an indication of the number of people in favour of a particular course of action, not of those who are strongly opposed to it.
While there may be enough strength of feeling on a particular subject to achieve a high number of signatures in favour of the petition, there may be an even greater strength of feeling against it which goes unseen.
By not allowing people to vote against an issue, we could easily be overlooking a majority view in favour of an active minority.
